settings.title: Our Partnerships.Our Spirit.
settings.subtitle: Building lasting relationships through shared passion and trust.

settings.name: NEW YORK GIANTS
settings.des: SGB and Zero Restriction entered into partnership in April 2023 for ZR to be the Official Outerwear Provider of the NY Giants. Front office executives have long worn ZR (and BD) so it was a natural fit to partner together officially.

settings.name: METROPOLITAN GOLF ASSOCIATION
settings.des: SGB became the official apparel partner of the Metropolitan Golf Association in January 2024. The Met is one of the oldest and largest golf associations in the country, boasting over 500 member clubs and 150,000 golfers.

settings.name: PGA TOUR: PREFERRED RETAIL PARTNER
settings.des: SGB is entering into its second year of a two-year deal with the PGA Tour called the Preferred Retail Partner program. This partnership a lows us to use the the tournament mark for WM Phoenix Open and The Players Championship for online sales on our channels.

settings.name: THE GOLFER’S JOURNAL
settings.des: SGB entered into partnership with The Golfer’s Journal (TGJ) in the Fall of 2024, designating Zero Restriction as the exclusive outerwear provider of TGJ. The Golfer’s Journal is a quarterly publication known for exce lent storyte ling and photography. They have also created a community of subscribers ca led the Broken Tee Society (BTS) which is housed on Discord and comes with varying levels of membership and perks. They host a series of events throughout the year at high profile golf courses for the BTS community.

settings.name: THE FRIED EGG / SHOTGUN START
settings.des: SGB renewed its longstanding partnership with Cluck Media (The Fried Egg, Shotgun Start Podcast) in January 2024. It’s been one of the most successful marketing partnerships to date, one that provides both awareness as we l as bottom line sales. The Fried Egg is a media platform founded by Andy Johnson, dedicated to covering golf course architecture. The Shotgun Start is a weekly podcast co-hosted by Andy Johnson and Brendan Porath which covers cultura ly relevant topics in professional golf.

settings.name: PRACTICAL GOLF (JON SHERMAN)
settings.des: SGB signed Jon Sherman to an ambassador contract in 2023 (two-year deal) to represent both BD and ZR. Jon is the founder of Practical Golf, a media platform dedicated to helping amateur players improve their game. He authored the Amazon best-se ler Four Foundations of Golf. He’s also the co-host of The Sweet Spot podcast, one of the top ranked golf podcasts in the US. Jon has long been a supporter and affiliate partner, having sold over $60,000 in net product sales. Jon has an impressive and influential performance marketing platform to take advantage of.

settings.name: RED CLAY SOUL
settings.des: Red Clay Soul is a blog and social media platform dedicated to the Sporting Southern lifestyle: menswear, golf, hunting, fishing and SEC footba l. The platform is run by Atlanta-native Jay Sjoholm who’s been a long-time supporter and promoter of B. Draddy cotton and Zero Restriction. He has an active, engaged fo lowing that looks to him for style and life tips. His platform for giveaways and product promotion. We have a set list of deliverables below but he’s flexible and open to a l ideas and doing more than promised.

settings.name: DORMIE NETWORK
settings.des: Dormie Network is an innovative private club model that has full ownership of (7) private clubs in the US a lows its members access to all. They are a key wholesale account for us where our brands have a significant footprint in their shops and for their gifting. They have an active marketing team that is more than wi ling to pair up for giveaways and promotions. Gabby Steiner, the lead buyer for Dormie Club (NC), is a great ambassador for our brands and can help with access and content as needed.
